title: 103_s655
content: The Act titled "Marine Navigation Safety Improvement Act of 1993" establishes the Marine Navigation Safety Account. The Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to establish the Marine Navigation Safety Account within the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund. The Marine Navigation Safety Account is established within the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund. The Secretary is required to transfer specific amounts to the account, including a percentage of taxes received in certain years and interest on those amounts. The Marine Navigation Safety Account is funded by transferring specific amounts from taxes received in certain years and interest. These funds are used for programs and activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. The Marine Navigation Safety Account is funded by transferring specific amounts from taxes received in certain years and interest for programs and activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration related to commercial marine navigation. AMENDMENT TO THE WATER RESOURCES DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 1986. Section 210 of the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 is amended to allocate funds from the Marine Navigation Safety Account for programs related to commercial marine navigation by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. The Water Resources Development Act of 1986 amends Section 210 to allocate funds for commercial marine navigation programs by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, including nautical charting, marine tides, charting survey ship support, and marine weather services for navigation safety in U.S. waters. The Water Resources Development Act of 1986 allocates funds for marine navigation programs by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, with specific conditions on the use of funds transferred to the Marine Navigation Safety Account. Funds transferred to the Marine Navigation Safety Account can be used for operational aspects and enhancing capabilities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for marine navigation programs. Funds transferred to the Marine Navigation Safety Account can be used to offset previous appropriations for operations, research, and facilities at the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
